name: Spirit Wedding Scroll
skill: Deals 1325/1625 DMG to 3 enemies (melee priority), with a low chance of inflicting Stun.
ability: Restores HP to all allies at the start of each wave.

additional_data.description: The spirit of an illustrated scroll documenting marriages in the spirit world. She tends to appear suddenly at weddings without being invited. She can instantaneously transfer everything she sees onto her scroll, so you don't have to worry whether she managed to capture a special moment—she definitely got it, and much more. However, she also records things in everyday life, even when you least expect it. It's not necessarily her intention, but she tends to record things that might be a tad shocking for the people involved. Thus many in the Bureau of the Occult have learned not to take her powers lightly.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 31/06/17 to 07/06/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 31/06/17 - 07/06/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 07/06/17
◦ Can only be exchanged once

skill: "I'll jot it all down in an instant!"
summon: "Oh don't worry, I've taken lots of notes!"
